text: Quebec nationalism or Québécois nationalism is a feeling and a political idea that prioritizes cultural belonging to, the defense of the interests of, and the recognition of the political legitimacy of the Québécois nation. It has been a movement and a central issue in Quebec politics since the beginning of the 1800s. Québécois nationalism has seen several political, ideological and partisan versions over the years. This short article about Canada can be made longer. You can help Wikipedia by adding to it.
title: Quebec nationalism
